collection.title: Suction Tableware
collection.body_html: No more flying plates! Our powerful suction tableware is designed to stay firmly put on high chair trays and tables, making mealtimes less messy and more fun.

products.title: ChubbyCheeks Baby Suction Bowl Set – Feeding Tableware for Complementary Foods
products.body_html:
Make mealtime safe and fun with the ChubbyCheeks Baby Suction Bowl Set. Designed for infants and toddlers, these bowls feature strong suction bases that keep them firmly in place, preventing spills and messes during feeding.

Crafted from BPA-free, food-grade silicone, the set is safe, soft, and gentle on your baby’s gums. Perfect for complementary foods, purees, cereals, or snacks, the bowls are easy to clean and dishwasher-safe. Lightweight and portable, they are ideal for home use or on-the-go feeding.

Key Features:

  • Strong Suction Base: Prevents spills and keeps bowls in place.

  • Safe & BPA-Free: Food-grade silicone for baby-safe feeding.

  • Perfect for Complementary Foods: Ideal for cereals, purees, and snacks.

  • Easy to Clean & Dishwasher Safe: Convenient for busy parents.

  • Portable & Lightweight: Perfect for home or travel use.

Ensure mess-free, safe, and enjoyable feeding times with the ChubbyCheeks Baby Suction Bowl Set.

products.title: HoneyCub Baby Silicone Suction Bowl – Cartoon Learning Dish for Infant Feeding & Training
products.body_html:
The HoneyCub Baby Silicone Suction Bowl makes mealtime easier and less messy. Built with a strong suction base, it sticks securely to flat surfaces, preventing spills and tipping while your child learns to self-feed.

Made from food-grade, BPA-free silicone, this bowl is safe, durable, and gentle for infants and toddlers. Its cartoon-style design keeps little ones engaged, while smooth edges allow easy scooping of food. Perfect for baby-led weaning, this suction bowl encourages independence and confidence in self-feeding.

Key Features

  • Strong suction base prevents slipping and tipping

  • Cartoon design keeps mealtime fun and engaging

  • Made from safe, BPA-free silicone material

  • Dishwasher and microwave safe for easy cleaning

  • Ideal for weaning and self-feeding training

products.title: OtterPot Silicone Suction Cup Dinner Plate – Baby & Children’s Divided Plate Set, Non-Slip Design, Easy-to-Clean | Essential Feeding Tableware for Toddlers & Kids
products.body_html:
OtterPot Silicone Suction Cup Dinner Plate brings together smart non-slip design and safe food-grade materials to create the perfect mealtime solution for babies and young children. Thoughtfully crafted for little hands and growing appetites, this divided plate supports baby-led weaning and toddler self-feeding while minimizing mess at the table.

Smart Design Features

  • Strong suction base keeps the plate securely in place to prevent tipping and throwing
  • Divided sections encourage healthy food variety and portion control
  • Food-grade silicone construction is safe, BPA-free, and gentle on little hands and gums
  • Easy-to-clean material resists stains and odors, safe for dishwasher and microwave use
  • Durable flexible design won’t break, chip, or crack—even with daily use
  • Fun, child-friendly shapes and colors make mealtimes more engaging

Setup and Usage

  1. Place the plate on a smooth, clean surface and press down to activate suction
  2. Divide meals into the plate’s separate compartments for easy self-feeding
  3. Serve directly to your baby or toddler—no extra bowls needed
  4. After use, simply lift the tab to release suction and wash by hand or in the dishwasher

Product Specifications

  • Material: 100% Food-Grade Silicone, BPA-Free
  • Style: Suction base with divided plate design
  • Colors: Multiple child-friendly options
  • Suitable for: Babies (6M+) and toddlers learning self-feeding
  • Package: 1 complete silicone suction cup divided plate

 

Why Choose This Plate

 

  •  Mess-free mealtime with strong suction to reduce spills
  • Encourages independence and healthy eating habits from the start
  • Safe, eco-friendly silicone for peace of mind
  • Easy to clean and durable for everyday use
  • Playful design makes eating fun and stress-free for both parents and children

products.title: PP Baby Training Cups 160ml - Ergonomic Handles & Suction Base
products.body_html:
Baby Training Cups with Handles - Safe Transition from Bottle to Cup

These baby cups with handles provide the perfect solution for your little one's drinking needs during the transition from bottle to cup. Designed specifically for infants and toddlers aged 7-12 months, these training cups support independent drinking development.

Key Features & Specifications

  • Material: High-quality PP (polypropylene) - safe, durable, and chemical-free
  • Capacity: 160ml volume suitable for water, milk, or other beverages
  • Age Range: 7-12 months
  • Design: Ergonomic handles for comfortable grip
  • Safety Feature: Suction base minimizes spills and keeps cup secure
  • Certification: CIQ approved for safety and quality assurance

Ergonomic Design for Developing Independence

The ergonomic handles provide a comfortable grip for tiny hands, encouraging independence in your child's drinking habits. The unique suction feature ensures that the cup stays securely in place during use, minimizing spills and messes during mealtime.

With a charming patchwork pattern, these cups are not only functional but also visually appealing, making mealtime more enjoyable for your little one. The 160ml capacity is ideal for portion control while learning proper drinking techniques.

Make the transition to independent drinking easier with these training cups. The CIQ certification ensures safety and quality assurance for peace of mind during your baby's developmental milestone.

products.title: PP Cartoon Suction Cup Bowl - Baby Feeding Tableware 3+ Months
products.body_html:
PP Cartoon Suction Cup Bowl - Safe Baby Feeding Tableware for 3+ Months

The ideal solution for secure baby feeding—our PP Cartoon Suction Cup Bowl for Kids! This cartoon-themed baby bowl transforms feeding time into an enjoyable experience. Made from high-quality PP material, this PVC-free suction cup bowl ensures safe eating for your child while providing durability for daily use.

This baby feeding bowl features an innovative suction cup base that securely attaches to smooth surfaces, preventing spills during meals. The strong suction eliminates tipped-over bowls for stress-free feeding sessions. Available in vibrant patchwork colors—pink, yellow, and blue—this cartoon bowl captures children's attention during mealtime.

Designed for babies aged 3 months and older, this suction bowl is perfect for introducing solid foods. The lightweight design helps little hands learn self-feeding, promoting independence and confidence in eating skills. This portable baby bowl works at home or on-the-go as essential feeding tableware.

With CE/EU certification, this suction cup bowl meets the highest safety standards for baby feeding products. This PP cartoon bowl combines practical feeding solutions with playful design for joyful mealtimes.

products.title: Saquela Silicone Baby Feeding Set with Suction – 10 Pcs Baby-Led Weaning Supplies: Suction Bowl, Divided Plate, Adjustable Soft Bib, Spoon, Fork, Snack Cup & Utensils, Sakura Pink | Essential Mealtime Kit for Toddlers
products.body_html:
Saquela Silicone Baby Feeding Set with Suction – 10 Pcs Baby-Led Weaning Supplies: Suction Bowl, Divided Plate, Adjustable Soft Bib, Spoon, Fork, Snack Cup & Utensils, Sakura Pink | Essential Mealtime Kit for Toddlers

The Saquela Silicone Baby Feeding Set combines safe, mess-free functionality with a stylish Sakura Pink finish to create the perfect baby-led weaning solution for modern families. This thoughtfully designed 10-piece set equips parents with everything needed to encourage independence, reduce spills, and make mealtimes more enjoyable for both babies and toddlers.

Smart Design Features

  • Complete 10-Piece Bundle – Includes suction bowl, divided plate, adjustable bib, spoon, fork, snack cup with lid, and other essential utensils.
  • Strong Suction Base – Keeps bowls and plates firmly in place, preventing tipping and messy spills.
  • Premium Food-Grade Silicone – 100% BPA-free, phthalate-free, and safe for delicate gums and developing teeth.
  • Adjustable Soft Bib – Comfortable fit with a deep catch pocket for food and liquid spills.
  • Baby-Friendly Utensils – Ergonomically designed spoon and fork support self-feeding and motor skill development.
  • Snack Cup with Lid – Ideal for storing snacks at home or on-the-go, spill-resistant for travel convenience.

Setup and Usage

  1. Press suction bowl or plate onto a smooth, clean surface for a secure hold.
  2. Adjust the soft silicone bib to fit comfortably around your baby’s neck.
  3. Encourage self-feeding with the included spoon and fork, or assist as needed.
  4. Store finger foods or snacks in the spill-proof snack cup with lid.
  5. After meals, wash items with warm soapy water or place in the dishwasher for easy cleaning.

Product Specifications

  • Material: 100% food-grade silicone, BPA-free, non-toxic
  • Set Includes: Suction bowl, divided plate, adjustable bib, spoon, fork, snack cup with lid, and utensils (10 pieces total)
  • Color: Sakura Pink (stylish and gender-neutral)
  • Style: Baby-led weaning and toddler mealtime essentials
  • Care: Dishwasher and microwave safe for daily convenience

Why Choose This Feeding Set

  • Mess-Free Mealtimes – Strong suction reduces food spills and keeps dishes in place.
  • Safe & Durable – Non-toxic silicone ensures long-lasting, worry-free use.
  • Supports Baby-Led Weaning – Designed for independence, motor skill growth, and healthy eating habits.
  • Easy to Clean – Dishwasher-safe, stain-resistant, and quick-drying.
  • Beautiful Sakura Pink Finish – Adds a touch of charm to your baby’s mealtime setup.

 

✅ With the Saquela Silicone Baby Feeding Set, you can transform mealtimes into stress-free, fun learning experiences while giving your baby the tools to grow confidently into self-feeding.

The Adlytee Silicone Baby Feeding Set combines thoughtful design and practical functionality to make baby-led weaning simple, safe, and stress-free. This complete 10-piece set is designed for modern families and offers durable silicone construction, strong suction bases to prevent spills, and baby-friendly utensils that grow with your little one.

  • Complete 10-Piece Baby Feeding Set – Includes suction bowl, divided plate, adjustable soft bib, spoon, fork, snack cup with lid, and essential weaning utensils.

  • Ergonomic Baby Utensils – Baby-sized spoon and fork encourage self-feeding while being easy for little hands to hold.

Setup and Usage

  1. Place the suction bowl or plate on a clean, flat surface and press down for a secure hold.
  2. Adjust the soft silicone bib to fit comfortably around your baby's neck.
  3. Use the baby spoon and fork to introduce solids, or let your toddler self-feed easily.
  4. Store snacks or finger foods in the spill-resistant snack cup with a lid.
  5. Clean all items with warm, soapy water or place them in the dishwasher for easy care.

products.title: Silicone Baby Suction Plate - Smile Face Design BPA-Free Toddler
products.body_html:
Silicone Baby Feeding Plate with Suction Base - Smile Face Design

• Sucker Bowl Design: Our innovative sucker bowl design ensures that the plate remains securely in place, allowing your little one to enjoy their meal without the mess. No more worries about spills and slides – mealtime is now a breeze for both parents and toddlers!

• Adorable Smile Face: Featuring a delightful smile face design, this plate adds a touch of fun and playfulness to every meal, making eating an enjoyable experience for your child. Watch as your toddler's face lights up with joy during mealtime!


• Premium Quality Material: Crafted from high-quality, food-grade silicone, this plate is not only durable but also capable of withstanding high temperatures. It's perfectly safe for your child to use, ensuring peace of mind for parents.


• Perfect for Toddler Training: Designed specifically for toddlers, this plate aids in the transition to solid foods. It encourages children to learn to eat independently while enhancing their fine motor skills, making it an essential tool for mealtime training.

• Safe and Non-Toxic: Rest easy knowing that this dining plate is made from safe, non-toxic silicone, free from harmful chemicals such as BPA, Lead, Cadmium, Phthalates, PVC, and Latex, making it ideal for your precious little one.


• Easy to Clean: The silicone material is not only soft and gentle for babies, but it's also incredibly easy to clean. Simply toss it in the dishwasher or give it a quick wash – mealtime cleanup has never been simpler!


• Fun and Engaging Design: The cute smile face design transforms mealtime into a lively experience, encouraging your child to eat with enthusiasm and making every meal a fun adventure.


• Ideal for Ages 7-12 Months: Specifically designed for babies aged 7-12 months, this plate is perfect for parents looking to introduce solid foods to their little ones in a safe and enjoyable manner.

• Develops Eating Skills: This dining plate not only makes mealtime fun but also helps toddlers develop their eating skills, fostering independence and confidence as they learn to navigate solid foods.


• Made from Safe and Durable Silicone: This plate is constructed from high-quality silicone that is safe for babies and durable enough to withstand daily use, making it a reliable choice for your child's dining experience.


• Versatile Color Options: Available in a variety of charming colors – Grey, Pink, Blue, Khaki, and Green – you can choose the perfect shade to match your child's personality or nursery decor.


• Temperature Resistant: With a temperature tolerance of -40℃ to 220℃, this plate is microwave and dishwasher safe, making it a versatile addition to your kitchenware.


Description:

Item Name: Baby Silicone Dining Plate

Material: Food Grade Silicone

Size: 19.5*19.5*3.5cm

Color Options: Grey/Pink/Blue/Khaki/Green


Feature:

1. 100% Food Grade Silicone, non-toxic, free from BPA, Lead, Cadmium, Phthalates, PVC, and Latex.

2. Soft and gentle, perfect for babies to use.

3. Easy to clean and maintain.

4. Microwave and dishwasher safe for added convenience.

5. Temperature-resistant, suitable for a wide range of temperatures.


Package Included:

1 x Baby Sucker Bowl


Notes:

1. Please note that due to lighting effects, monitor's brightness/contrast settings, etc., there may be slight differences in color tone between the website's photo and the actual item.

products.title: Ultimate Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set - Perfect Training Dishes with Spoon for Hassle-Free Feeding
products.body_html:
Introducing the Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set - the ultimate training dishes designed to make mealtime enjoyable and stress-free for both parents and little ones! This innovative dinnerware set includes a sturdy bowl, a spoon, and a fork, all crafted with your child's needs in mind.

Size Chart:
Inner wall diameter: 12.2cm/4.8" | Deep Bowl: 5cm/1.97" | Sucker diameter: 8.8cm/3.46" | Total width of the bowl: 16.2cm/3.38" | Total height of the bowl: 6cm/2.36"

Specifications:
Material: PP (Polypropylene)
Function: Dinnerware Set
Certification: CE / EU
Pattern Type: Solid
Material Feature: BPA Free, Latex Free
Classification: Dinnerware Set

Features:

Constructed from high-quality PP material, this bowl set is tasteless, non-toxic, and highly durable, ensuring it withstands the rigors of everyday use.
The super strong suction base keeps the bowl securely in place, preventing spills and messes during feeding time, making it an ideal training bowl for your little one.
Bright and vibrant colors add a fun element to mealtime, making it an exciting experience for your child while encouraging them to eat independently.
Available in three delightful colors, this bowl set is designed to be loved by children, making it a perfect addition to their dining essentials.
Say goodbye to worries about broken dishes, as this set is designed to be both safe and resilient, giving you peace of mind during feeding time.


Package Includes:
1 x Baby Sucker Bowl + Spoon + Fork
Note:
1. Please allow 0.3-0.8 cm error due to manual measurement. Ensure you do not mind before purchasing.
2. Due to differences between monitors, the actual product may vary slightly in color.

products.title: Ultimate Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - Ideal Training Tableware for Little Ones!
products.body_html:
Introducing our Suction Cup Baby Bowl Set with Spoon - the ultimate training tableware designed specifically for your little ones! This innovative set is perfect for encouraging your child to eat independently while minimizing mess at mealtime.

Features:

  • Secure Suction Cup Base: The bowl is equipped with a TPE material suction cup at the bottom, providing high elasticity and anti-aging properties. This clever design ensures the bowl stays firmly in place, preventing spills and making mealtime a breeze.
  • Lightweight & Easy to Clean: Made from durable PP material, the bowl is lightweight and easy to handle. It's also high temperature resistant, making it suitable for all types of food. Cleanup is a snap - simply wash with water or place it in the dishwasher!
  • Temperature-Sensitive Spoon: Our set includes a specially designed spoon that changes color when the food temperature exceeds 40 degrees Celsius, allowing you to ensure your child's food is safe to eat.
  • Insulated Lid: The ingeniously designed suction cup comes with a lid for added insulation, keeping food warm longer and making it perfect for on-the-go meals.
  • Pre-Use Preparation: For best results, wash the bowl with water and place it in boiling water for 2-3 minutes before use to ensure optimal suction.

Specifications:

  • Material: PP + TPE
  • Color: As shown in images
  • Bowl Size: 16*6cm
  • Spoon Size: 13*2.5cm

Package Includes:

  • Set 1: 1 bowl + 1 cover + 1 spoon
  • Set 2: 1 bowl + 1 fork + 1 spoon

Rest assured, this product is 100% brand new and of high quality, certified safe for your little ones. Ideal for babies aged 7-12 years, this bowl set is free from harmful chemicals and PVC, making it a safe choice for your child's dining experience.

Don't miss out on this essential mealtime companion! Add our store to your Favorite Stores to stay updated on new arrivals and exclusive discounts!

products.title: WobbleBub Baby Suction Bowl Set – Temperature-Sensing Spoon & Feeding Tableware for Infants
products.body_html:
• Make mealtime safe, fun, and worry-free with the WobbleBub Baby Suction Bowl Set. Designed for infants and toddlers, this innovative feeding set features strong suction bowls that prevent spills and a temperature-sensing spoon to ensure food is always at the perfect, safe temperature.

    Made from BPA-free, food-grade silicone, the set is gentle on your baby’s gums and safe for everyday use. Perfect for complementary foods, cereals, purees, and snacks, it is easy to clean, lightweight, and portable for feeding at home or on-the-go.

    Key Features:

    • Temperature-Sensing Spoon: Alerts you if food is too hot.

    • Strong Suction Bowls: Prevent spills and messes during feeding.

    • Safe & BPA-Free: Made from food-grade silicone.

    • Perfect for Infants: Ideal for cereals, purees, and snacks.

    • Easy to Clean & Portable: Dishwasher safe and travel-friendly.

    Enjoy mess-free, safe, and comfortable feeding times with the WobbleBub Baby Suction Bowl Set.
